name: Penerimaan Purchase Order Per Item Detail
query: SELECT x.parent as "Purchase Order::140", x.posting_date as "Tanggal:Date:120", x.item_code as "Kode Barang:Link/Item:120", x.item_name as "Item Name::200", x.uom as "Satuan:Link/UOM:80", x.qty as "Vol SPB:Float:120", x.received_qty as "Vol Datang:Float:120", x.qty_accepted as "Vol Diterima:Float:120", x.rejected_qty as "Vol Ditolak:Float:120", x.unfinished_qty as "Vol Kurang:Float:120", x.description "Deskripsi::220" FROM (SELECT concat("", poi.parent, "") parent, po.transaction_date posting_date, poi.parent as purchase_order, poi.item_code, poi.item_name, poi.uom, SUM(poi.qty) qty, COALESCE(pri.received_qty, 0) received_qty, COALESCE(pri.qty, 0) qty_accepted, COALESCE(pri.rejected_qty, 0) rejected_qty, SUM(poi.qty)-COALESCE(pri.received_qty, 0) unfinished_qty, COALESCE(pri.description, "") description FROM `tabPurchase Order Item` poi INNER JOIN `tabPurchase Order` po ON po.name = poi.parent LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(pri.received_qty) received_qty, SUM(pri.qty) qty, SUM(pri.rejected_qty) rejected_qty, pri.purchase_order, pri.item_code, GROUP_CONCAT(pri.description separator ',') description, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(pr.posting_date, ': ', FORMAT(pri.qty, 2)) separator ',') detail FROM `tabPurchase Receipt Item` pri INNER JOIN `tabPurchase Receipt` pr ON pr.name = pri.parent WHERE pri.docstatus = 1 AND pr.posting_date BETWEEN %(date_from)s AND %(date_to)s GROUP BY pri.purchase_order, pri.item_code) pri ON pri.purchase_order = poi.parent AND pri.item_code = poi.item_code WHERE poi.docstatus = 1 GROUP BY poi.parent, poi.item_code UNION SELECT concat("    ",pri.parent, "") parent, pr.posting_date, pri.purchase_order, pri.item_code, pri.item_name, pri.uom, 0 qty, COALESCE(pri.received_qty, 0) received_qty, COALESCE(pri.qty, 0) qty_accepted, COALESCE(pri.rejected_qty, 0) rejected_qty, 0 unfinished_qty, COALESCE(pri.description, "") description FROM `tabPurchase Receipt Item` pri INNER JOIN `tabPurchase Receipt` pr ON pr.name = pri.parent WHERE pri.docstatus = 1 AND pr.posting_date BETWEEN %(date_from)s AND %(date_to)s ) x ORDER BY x.purchase_order , x.item_code, x.posting_date
report_name: Penerimaan Purchase Order Per Item Detail
